feature.name: Charge
feature.shortDescription: If the boar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature right befor ehitting it with a tusk attack, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) slashing damagge and must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

feature.name: Relentless
feature.shortDescription: If the boar takes damage that reduces it to 0 hit points, unless the damage is 7 or more or from a critical hit, it drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
action.description: The bear makes two attacks, one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.description: +3 to hit, reach 5ft, one-target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.description: +3 to hit, reach 5ft, one-target. Hit: 7 (2d4+2) slashing damage.
